verses.text: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* answer thee \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* trouble; \w The|strong="H1732"\w* name \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Jacob set thee up \w on|strong="H5329"\w* high;

Send \w thee|strong="H6030"\w* \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* strengthen \w thee|strong="H6030"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion;
Remember \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* offerings, \w And|strong="H7971"\w* accept \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* burnt sacrifice; \qs Selah\qs*
Grant thee \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* heartâ€™s desire, \w And|strong="H5930"\w* fulfill \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H2142"\w* counsel.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* triumph \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* salvation, \w And|strong="H6098"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* banners: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H4390"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* petitions.

Now know \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* saveth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* anointed; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* answer \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* holy heaven \w With|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w saving|strong="H3444"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

Some \add trust\add* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chariots, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* some \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses; \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* mention \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* bowed down \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fallen; \w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* risen, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stand upright.
Save, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: Let \w the|strong="H6965"\w* King answer us \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H5749"\w*.
